name: Repton Mania
overview: This is a compilation of the first two games of the Repton series of top-down puzzle games for the ZX Spectrum. The player controls the reptilian creature Repton, who must strategically dig, move boulders, and avoid monsters (that hatch from eggs and chase Repton) to collect diamonds in an underground maze. The boulders roll downward and must be carefully managed in order to keep paths open and squash monsters. The first game comprises of 12 levels which can be skipped to via passwords from the main menu. The second game introduces several new elements to the gameplay and puzzles. It is also a single large level which the player teleports from place to place in and must complete in one go.
